introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is かいさつ, which you will often hear in train stations in Japan. This is a handy term to know if you're navigating the public transportation system.
meaning_explanation_english: The word かいさつ means "ticket gate." It's the area in train stations where passengers have their tickets or passes checked before entering or exiting the station premises.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 出入り口 : でいりぐち : exit and entrance
乗車口 : じょうしゃぐち : entrance
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word かいさつ are でいりぐち andじょうしゃぐち. "でいりぐち" means entrance or exit without necessarily involving ticket checking, while "じょうしゃぐち" tends to focus on the boarding point where you enter a vehicle, most often used for buses or airplanes, providing slightly different contexts of usage.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word かいさつ are でぐち and へいさ. "でぐち" means exit, referring to leaving a location, not necessarily involving ticket checking, while "へいさ" implies closure, like when a gate is closed, which contrasts with an open or operational ticket gate.

example_sentences.kanji: 改札口に友達がいます。
example_sentences.furigana: 改札口(かいさつぐち)に友達(ともだち)がいます。

translations.EN: A friend is at the ticket gate.
translations.ID: Seorang teman ada di gerbang tiket.
translations.ES: Un amigo está en la taquilla de entrada.
translations.VI: Một người bạn đang ở cổng soát vé.
translations.FR: Un ami est à la guichet.
translations.TL: May kaibigan sa gate ng ticket.
translations.MY: နှစ်ချင်းမိတ်ဆွေသည် လက်မှတ်ဂိတ်၌ ရှိသည်။
translations.HI: एक दोस्त टिकट गेट पर है।
translations.FA: یک دوست در دروازه بلیط است.

example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は改札(かいさつ)を通(とお)る。

translations.EN: I pass through the ticket gate.
translations.FR: Je passe par la barrière de tickets.
translations.BN: আমি টিকিট গেট দিয়ে পার হই।
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော်က လက်မှတ်တံခါးကို ဖြတ်ပြီးသွားတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं टिकट गेट के माध्यम से जाता हूँ।
translations.AR: أنا أعبر من خلال بوابة التذاكر.
translations.FA: من از دستگاه بلیط عبور می‌کنم.

example_sentences.furigana: 改札(かいさつ)で待(ま)つ。

translations.ES: Espera en la puerta de entrada.
translations.FR: Attendre à la barrière de péage.
translations.MY: လက်မှတ်ဝင်ပေါက်တွင်စောင့်ပေးပါ။
translations.FA: در جلوی دروازه بلیط منتظر بمانید.

example_sentences.furigana: 改札(かいさつ)を出(で)る。

translations.FR: Sortez de la barrière de ticket.
translations.MY: လက်မှတ် တံခါးကို ထွက်ပါ။

examination of tickets.MY: လက်မှတ် စစ်ဆေးခြင်း

ticket gate.MY: လက်မှတ်အကန့်
